mapper.insert: insert into riot_record(no, account_id, profile_icon_id, revision_date, name, id, puuid, summoner_level) values( seq_riot_record_no.nextval, #{accountId}, #{profileIconId}, #{revisionDate}, #{name}, #{id}, #{puuid}, #{summonerLevel} )

insert into riot_tier(no, league_id, queuetype, tier, rank, league_points, wins, losses, summoner_id) values( seq_riot_tier_no.nextval, #{leagueId}, #{queueType}, #{tier}, #{rank}, #{leaguePoints}, #{wins}, #{losses}, #{summonerId} )

insert into riot_myaccount(no, member_id, sm_id) values( seq_riot_myaccount_no.nextval, #{member_Id}, #{sm_Id}
)
mapper.select: select count(*) from riot_myaccount where member_id = #{member_Id} and sm_id = #{sm_Id}
select count(*) from riot_myaccount where member_id = #{member_Id}

select a.member_id, a.sm_id, a.fav_accept, b.name
from riot_myaccount a join riot_record b on a.sm_id = b.id where member_id = #{member_Id}
select count(*) from riot_myaccount where member_id = #{member_Id} and sm_id = #{sm_Id}
